Description: Magical gem; intaglio; lapis lazuli; square; double-bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: lion; Egyptian coffin; pylon; winged goddess and Pharaoh wearing crowns of Upper and Lower Egypt; scorpion and sphinx.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (603)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G430 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9901 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
